p: Those flowering plants are not only ornamental but also have significant medicinal values in terms of a versatile range of efficacies. Most of the previous research were aimed to explore the biological activities in leaves and other plant parts. The utilization of flowers as a source of phytochemicals and bioactivities was not well reported. That's why the present study aimed to investigate the phytochemicals and bioactivities of the flower extracts from three plants using in vitro and in vivo methods.
